"Darling Denfsovl" screamed Natdsha, be- side herself with rapture, springing to him, putting her arms round him, and kissing him. This escapade made everybody feel confused. Denfsov blushed too, but smiled and, taking Natdsha's hand, kissed it. 
Denfsov was shown to the room prepared for him, and the Rostovs all gathered round Nicholas in the sitting room.
